com.sdicons.json.validator.predicates

Class CustomValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sdicons.json.validator.predicates.Predicate
      • com.sdicons.json.validator.predicates.CustomValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator

    public abstract class CustomValidator
extends Predicate
    The super class of all custom Java validators. You can implement your own Java validator by deriving from this class and creating a CustomPredicate.
    See Also:
    CustomPredicate
